Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.graph.parser

Class AdjacencyMatrixParser

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.graph.parser.AdjacencyMatrixParser
public class AdjacencyMatrixParser extends Object
Provides a parser for specified FileReader containing graph specification represented by an adjacency matrix.

getGraphSets() method returns parsed data represented in Java collections.

toGraph() method instanciates an AdjacencyMatrixGraph with String as a class parameter.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdjacencyMatrixParser

      public AdjacencyMatrixParser(FileReader source) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException, DataFormatException
      Constructs an adjacency matrix parser for a specified FileReader source.

      First line should contain whitespace-separated names of vertices belong to graph which is being constructed. Remaining lines have to contain an adjacency matrix.

      For example:

      a !nil c

      # Commentary starts with #

      !nil 2 1

      0 2 1

      1234 2 9000

      This parser tries to ignore all incorrect input, however, in some cases the behaviour may be unpredictable.

      Parameters:
      source - a specified file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if a file is unavailable
      DataFormatException - if specified file has incorrect format
      IOException - if it is impossible to close the source.

  • Method Details

    • getGraphSets

      public Map.Entry<List<String>,Integer[][]> getGraphSets()
      Returns a set of vertices and an adjacency matrix as a result of parsing.
      Returns:
      a Map.Entry of set of vertices and set of edges

    • toGraph

      public AdjacencyMatrixGraph<String> toGraph()
      Instanciates an AdjacencyMatrixGraph based on a result of parsing.
      Returns:
      a new instance of AdjacencyMatrixGraph
